ftp.label: FTP target URL:
ftp.description: URL to upload the JSON file containing the result to (starts with 'ftp://' or 'sftp://'; might include username, password, and path on the server). If empty, no result will be uploaded.

proxy.label: FTP proxy
proxy.description: URL of proxy to use while uploading the JSON file containing the result (if empty, no proxy will be used).

target.column.label: Resulting column:
target.column.description: Name of the column in the target table to create the JSON file for uploading from.

verbose.description: Write FTP network information to the server console while uploading the results.
